objects.specification: A large rectangular solid panel representing the fair booth floor, using a polished dark gray finish reminiscent of a high-tech showroom. The surface is smooth and slightly reflective, conveying a professional and modern aesthetic with subtle luster.

A set of four vertical wall panels arranged orthogonally to form a rectangular enclosure, each with a smooth matte finish in the car brand's signature color palette. The walls are uniform in height and thickness, presenting clean edges for a sleek, modern boundary.

children.specification: A sleek vertical panel painted in the brand's color, forming the rear boundary of the booth with uniform height and a slim profile.
A slender vertical panel in brand color, forming the left boundary with consistent height and a flush matte finish.
A slender vertical panel in brand color, forming the right boundary with consistent height and a flush matte finish.
A sleek front panel in the car brand’s color, completing the enclosure with a modern, streamlined look.

objects.specification: A realistic demo car model with accurate modern sedan proportions featuring smooth aerodynamic curves, detailed wheel assemblies, body panel line details, transparent windows, and a high-gloss painted finish. It includes realistic tires, lights, and interior silhouettes for a showroom-quality prototype.

A raised, elongated cylindrical display platform with minimalist styling, smooth rounded edges, and a subtle reflective surface. Sized to elevate the demo car, it contrasts the floor with a clean matte or metallic finish.
A collection of illuminated display stands arranged symmetrically around the car, each featuring a minimalist pillar design with integrated diffuse lighting and a flat top surface for brochures.

children.specification: A sleek illuminated display stand with integrated lighting along the edges, a glossy white finish, and a flat top for brochures.
A sleek illuminated display stand with integrated lighting along the edges, a glossy white finish, and a flat top for brochures.
A sleek illuminated display stand with integrated lighting along the edges, a glossy white finish, and a flat top for brochures.

objects.specification: A modern reception desk with a streamlined rectangular form, high-gloss surface, and a subtle LED-lit front panel. It includes concealed storage compartments and a welcoming counter height for visitor interactions.

A cluster of overhead spotlights with focused beams directed at the demo car and display stands. The fixtures feature sleek cylindrical housings in matte black with adjustable mounts for precise lighting angles.

children.specification: An adjustable spotlight fixture with a cylindrical housing in matte black, featuring a high-intensity spot beam and a realistic industrial design.
An adjustable spotlight fixture with a cylindrical housing in matte black, featuring a high-intensity spot beam and a realistic industrial design.
An adjustable spotlight fixture with a cylindrical housing in matte black, featuring a high-intensity spot beam and a realistic industrial design.
An adjustable spotlight fixture with a cylindrical housing in matte black, featuring a high-intensity spot beam and a realistic industrial design.

objects.specification: An inviting seating area with multiple visitor chairs and tables arranged along the side of the booth, providing comfortable waiting spots and surfaces for resting items.

children.specification: A comfortable visitor chair with a padded seat and backrest, a modern minimalist metal frame in dark gray, soft textured upholstery, and proportions suited for a waiting area.
A comfortable visitor chair with a padded seat and backrest, a modern minimalist metal frame in dark gray, soft textured upholstery, and proportions suited for a waiting area.
A comfortable visitor chair with a padded seat and backrest, a modern minimalist metal frame in dark gray, soft textured upholstery, and proportions suited for a waiting area.
A comfortable visitor chair with a padded seat and backrest, a modern minimalist metal frame in dark gray, soft textured upholstery, and proportions suited for a waiting area.
A small square side table with a sleek tabletop surface and slim supporting legs, in a glossy neutral finish sized for placing brochures or personal items.
A small square side table with a sleek tabletop surface and slim supporting legs, in a glossy neutral finish sized for placing brochures or personal items.

objects.specification: Decorative elements including promotional banners and brand logos mounted on the walls, displaying vibrant visuals and 3D emblems to reinforce branding.

children.specification: A horizontal promotional banner panel featuring the car brand's logo and marketing graphics. It has a thin profile, smooth surface, vibrant full-color print, and subtle support structure.
A standalone 3D logo element representing the car brand emblem, featuring raised relief design, solid fill color matching brand guidelines, and a slight bevel on the edges for depth.
